tile.simplegenerators.ender_simple.name: 簡易終界發電機
tile.simplegenerators.nether_simple.name: 簡易地獄發電機
tile.simplegenerators.soul_simple.name: Simple Soul Generator
guide.simplegenerators.combustion.descri: Combustion generators burn combustible solid fuels to generate energy. These fuels can include furnace fuels and others.
guide.simplegenerators.culinary.descript: Culinary Generators burn foods to generate energy. These fuels can include pretty much any food.
guide.simplegenerators.ender.page.title: 終界發電機
guide.simplegenerators.ender.description: The Ender Generators use ender based items to generate energy. These usually are items such as ender pearls or ender eyes.
guide.simplegenerators.nether.page.title: 地獄發電機
guide.simplegenerators.nether.descriptio: The Nether Generators use nether based items to generate energy. These usually are items such as nether stars ore blocks of nether stars.
guide.simplegenerators.geothermal.descri: Geothermal Generators generate energy from hot fluids such as Lava.
Fluid Combustion Generators generate energy from combustable fluids such as fuel or ethenol.
guide.simplegenerators.turbine.descripti: Turbine Generators require hot gasseous substances such as Steam to generate energy.
guide.simplegenerators.soul.page.title: 靈魂發電機
guide.simplegenerators.soul.button.title: 靈魂發電機
guide.simplegenerators.soul.description: Soul Generaters require items that have remnents of a mobs souls left behind. Usually these items are mob heads or other rare drops from mobs.
guide.simplegenerators.modifier_speed.de: The speed modifier will increase the speed at which the generator runs. Use with caution as speed and consumption rates are increased equally.
guide.simplegenerators.modifier_efficien: The Generator doesnt run any faster but it will use less fuel.
